name: Mothboy needs his dad
description:
Mothman (yes that one) has lost his child, Mothboy, in the hellish scapes of a pre-apocalyptic city. Thankfully, a friendly little firefly has come along to help this son in need. Light the boy's way to guide him through the cityscape and bring him back to his father, but don't let the mortals set their eyes on this incomprehensible being, or they'll call the feds.

Only the mouse is needed for this game, simply left click on a lamp to turn it on or off, and use right click to change the type of light you bring to these lamps!

Credits:

- Art:

Lanea Zimmerman - https://opengameart.org/content/minimalist-sidescroll-city
GrafxKid - https://opengameart.org/content/city-mega-pack

Quick Guide (Spoilers!)

-White light attracts Mothboy

-Red light scares the Mothboy away

-Blue light draws the attention the humans

-Don't touch the bug zapper!
